TestGenerator

Class ExpressionRewriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestGenerator.ExpressionRewriter

  • public class ExpressionRewriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Rewrites an IExpression based on the equations defined in an algebraic specification
    Author:
    Adam
